isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CUMMINS PACE - 1992 - 1993 - TROUBLESHOOTING

svcsubsecinfo.para: This section only provides troubleshooting procedures for the Ignition feed circuit. The PT Pacer does not have controls or lamps on the instrument panel. All service for the PT Pacer Unit must be performed using off-board electronic service tools (See SERVICE TOOLS). Circuit diagrams and component locations of the installation are included in this section.
Consult the Cummins PT Pacer System Installation Manual or the Cummins Troubleshooting and Repair Manual for proper troubleshooting procedures, specifications and fault code descriptions.

svcproc.title: TESTING IGNITION FEED WITHOUT KYSOR ENGINE SHUTDOWN

step1.para: With key ON, measure voltage to ground at 19A connection to fuel shutoff solenoid.

step2.para: If battery voltage is present, the ignition feed is operating properly.
If battery voltage is not present, locate open in circuit 19D from key switch and repair.
